entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
